user.title: Connect a PurpleAir Station
user.description:
To connect to a PurpleAir station, you will first need a free API key. \
Email [contact@purpleair.com](mailto:contact@purpleair.com) to receive an API key.

In order to add the station, please locate the station on the [PurpleAir map](https://map.purpleair.com), select it, click on "Get this Widget" and finally, click on "Download Data". In the resulting page, grab the URL (which should look like "/sensorlist?key=ABC&show=123", copy the "show" value to the station ID field and copy the "key" string to the station read key.

A device will be created with basic data and will be populated on the next data pull.

data.api_key: Your API read key you received from PurpleAir
data.id: PurpleAir station ID you want to monitor
data.sensor_read_key: The station read key if the sensor is hidden (Optional)

legacy_migrate_without_api_key.title: Update PurpleAir sensor to use the new API
legacy_migrate_without_api_key.description:
This sensor needs to be updated to use the new PurpleAir API. This new API is much faster but requires free registration to get an API key.

You can get an API key by sending an email to [contact@purpleair.com](mailto:contact@purpleair.com). This sensor will continue to work with the legacy API but an stop working any time. You can come back and resume migration once you have your API key.
